top.title: Zelensky gives stark warning as EU leaders decide on Russia's frozen assets
top.summary: The EU is deciding whether to loan tens of billions of euros of Russian money to fund Ukraine's military and economic needs.

top.title: French 'Doctor Death' who poisoned patients jailed for life
top.summary: A court finds Frédéric Péchier guilty of contaminating infusion bags with substances that caused cardiac arrest or hemorrhaging.

top.title: Trump expected to expand access to  cannabis in a major shift in drug policy
top.summary: The order to place cannabis in the same category as Tylenol with codeine would mark the most significant change in US drug policy since 1971.

top.title: UK to ban deepfake AI 'nudification' apps
top.summary: A new offence looks to build on existing rules outlawing sexually explicit deepfakes and intimate image abuse.

top.title: One in three using AI for emotional support and conversation, UK says
top.summary: The Artificial Intelligence Security Institute (AISI) says the tech is being used by one in 25 people daily.

top.title: Facebook tests £9.99 monthly subscription for sharing more than two links
top.summary: Meta is encouraging users to verify themselves to unlock more features or engagement with their posts.
